thread.title: Watch This Guy Hoist His Girlfriend—and Wheelchair—While Doing Pullups
thread.title_full: Watch This Guy Hoist His Girlfriend—and Wheelchair—While Doing Pullups

author: Barry K
title: Watch This Guy Hoist His Girlfriend—and Wheelchair—While Doing Pullups
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
A lot of guys run or spin with their girlfriends. A few lift. Zack Ruhl hoists his lady—along with his wheelchair—while doing friggin’ pullups. Sure, she might give him a quick assist. But watching the “chair to bar” clip Ruhl posted on Instagram , we’re pretty sure she could let go of that bar and her man wouldn’t miss a beat. 
If you aren’t familiar with Ruhl, get acquainted, because he’s a boss. Birth defects c ost him both his legs at age 2 . But he didn’t let that stop him from playing high school football—as a defensive tackle —and becoming a CrossFit trainer. Ruhl’s Instagram is littered with videos of his training sessions, many of which are mesmerizing in their gravity-defying awesomeness . It’s hard to watch them and not feel ashamed of every lame excuse we ever came up with to skip a workout. Advertisement
